info.name: A MetaCritic Darkly
info.description:
Dark themes for MetaCritic. See "Advanced Style Settings" below to specify theme.

Screenshots of themes: https://imgur.com/a/SwJEI
info.additionalInfo:
2019-06-07: Small fixes to some text & border colors.
2018-06-29: Fixed search results & other styles.
2018-06-10: Might've fixed something, not really sure.
v1.3: Updated styles (fixed white row bgs, ugly hover box).
v1.2: Updated styles on more pages (some articles, login-related pages)
v1.1: Updated styles for item-specific pages (TV Show pages & others)
v1.0: Initial release

data.title: I will be using this one because there is no other.
A well-needed and updated dark style for MetaCritic

options.label: Obsidian

options.value: :root{--fg:#eaeaea;--bg:#1a1a1a;--fg-2:#70c0b1;--bg-2:#2a2a2a;--bg-odd:#424242;--fg-muted:#969896;--fg-input:#f0c674;--bg-input:#4a4a4a;--fg-input-hover:#f0e694;--bg-input-hover:#6a6a6a;--border:solid 0.5px #373b41;--border-color:#373b41;--fg-link:#e78c45;--fg-link-hover:#e7c547;--fg-link-visited:#d54e53;--fg-disabled:#ddd;--bg-disabled:#777;--fg-error:#fff;--fg-warning:#000;--fg-info:#fff;--fg-success:#fff;--bg-error:#600;--bg-warning:#fa4;--bg-info:#14a;--bg-success:#151;--syntax-fg:#eaeaea;--syntax-fg-2:#dadada;--syntax-bg:#000000;--syntax-bg-2:#2a2a2a;--syntax-comment:#969896;--syntax-builtin:#c397d8;--syntax-function:#7aa6da;--syntax-keyword:#ff9da4;--syntax-number:#ffc58f;--syntax-string:#b9ca4a;--syntax-font-family:"Menlo","Liberation Mono","Consolas","DejaVu Sans Mono","Ubuntu Mono","Courier New","andale mono","lucida console",monospace;--selection-fg:#000}
